name: Switch the situation
description:
This game was created by only 15 - 20 hours (not in a row).

It's not the best but it's playable.

I think I will make pixel art games after this game cause it's not really looks good, and I slightly better in pixel art than in digital art, it's pretty hard.

I'll be very happy if you would do comment something and give me a feedback, it's my first game I published here and fully created in unity without visual scripting, I very happy about the progress I made.

If you want to see the level of my pixel art and my digital art so here it is:

 pixel art:  

digital art:

So, I want to see your feedback, just to make some better games, you know every fail is just another step that helps you avoid mistakes in your main project of life.

And if you think this is not a fail, make sure to vote to this game.

To download: https://pigames-bp.itch.io/switch-the-situation-download;
